price: Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Mose, Mede Me nsεm ne Mekasaa ayi wo, akorͻn wo wͻ nnipa no so. Enti sͻ deε Mede ama woͻ no mu yie, na ka wͻn a wͻyi ayε no ho”.
arabic: قَالَ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنِّي ٱصۡطَفَيۡتُكَ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِرِسَٰلَٰتِي وَبِكَلَٰمِي فَخُذۡ مَآ ءَاتَيۡتُكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla yāmūsā innī iṣ'ṭafaytuka ʿalā al-nāsi birisālātī wabikalāmī fakhudh mā ātaytuka wakun mina al-shākirīna
